title: FENTANYL & OPEN BORDERS: The American Overdose Crisis Explained
description:
Joe Biden's border crisis is more than just illegal immigration. It's responsible for an increase in opioid overdoses as well. We explain why. Also, New Jersey teachers are grooming your kids. The videos being shown are actually shocking. And Brian Stelter was embarrassed by a college freshman. #Opioids #Fentanyl #Groomers #georgefloyd
